itemInfo.itemDesc:
Gratin made with quality cheese. 
- Unique effect: Max HP +70 for 110min
Attack Speed Rank +1 for 110min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Red Sauce
item.desc:
A red sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Steak, Cheese Gratin

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Cabbage
item.desc: A plump cabbage used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Fried Vegetables, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Cabbage using Bare Hands.

item.name: Grilled Sausage
item.desc:
A sausage roasted to perfection. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +1 for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Red Sauce
item.desc:
A red sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Steak, Cheese Gratin
